name: Mainport District
role_in_state: Primary commercial harbor and customs hub
culture_adjustments: Denser bilingualism: Island Creole widely used in ports
More mercantile pragmatism; guild law often supersedes local custom
Looser sea-initiation rites for transient sailors; tattoos more varied
Visible Merchant Brotherhood institutions and liturgies
Practical syncretism: Sea-Tide rites blended with ancestor offerings
constraints: Ritual magic dependent on imported reagents and secure storage
notes: Main customs house and guild courts located here
Ritual-practitioners cluster near bonded reagent warehouses
